alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 12:28PM EST until January 13 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following areas, Breathitt, Lee, Morgan, Owsley, Perry and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until 330 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1223 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated moderate to heavy rain was falling across the area. This rainfall combined with excessive runoff from the melting of snow is causing minor flooding or expected to cause minor flooding within the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... West Liberty, Jackson, Beattyville, Campton, Booneville, Simpson, Henry, Lewis, Fincastle, Buckhorn, Gentry, Lawson, Frozen Creek, Yeadon, Elkatawa, War Creek, Fivemile, Chenowee, Pence and Vancleve.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
